long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our game extension brings fun animated cheerleaders to your screen with just one click! These cute cheerleaders include animals, plants, fruits, and funny objects like hamburgers and chips, all doing cheerful dances to lift your mood instantly. Perfect for anyone who needs a little extra joy while browsing!

Great Times to Use Cheer Game:

- While Waiting for Video Ads or Popups to Finish
   Don’t just sit there bored—watch our fun cheerleaders dance instead!

- After a Meeting or During a Break
  Wrap up a meeting on a cheerful note or display the cheerleaders as a screensaver during a pause to keep the team smiling!

- Taking a Study Break  
   Feeling tired while studying? Click the extension to relax and smile for a moment.

- Celebrate Small Wins  
   Finished a task or reached a small goal? Click to let the cheerleaders celebrate with you!

- Cheer Yourself Up Anytime  
   Feeling a bit down or tired? The cheerleaders are here to make you smile.

How to Play?

1) Enable/Disable Cheerleaders

Users can easily enable or disable the cheerleader feature on the settings page. By default, the feature is enabled after installation. Once enabled, a random cheerleader animation appears in the bottom-right corner. Clicking on it triggers an overlay showcasing a cheerleader formation.

2) Random Dance Formations

Clicking the bottom-right button will cycle through two different dance styles, as well as display random formations from a selection of 20 unique configurations.

3) Magic Wand Feature

At the top right corner, a Magic Wand icon allows users to switch between single and multiple cheerleader displays. When highlighted, it uses multiple cheerleaders; when not, it uses a single cheerleader.

4) Customizable Formations

Users can select words from the right panel to build custom cheerleader formations for extra fun. They can also input their own words for personalized messages. In future versions, we will allow users to share these formations with friends or on social media.

Helpful Tips:

When random cheerleader animation appears in the bottom-right corner, you can drag it to any position on the page if it blocks your view.

Have fun with this cheer game and add joy and excitement to your browsing experience!

The algorithms of animating cheerleaders refer to the open-source project: https://github.com/facebookresearch/AnimatedDrawings
